name: batch_size
tooltip: input batch size

name: loadSize
tooltip: scale images to this size

name: fineSize
tooltip: then crop to this size

name: input_nc
tooltip: # of input image channels

name: output_nc
tooltip: # of output image channels

name: ngf
tooltip: # of gen filters in first conv layer

name: ndf
tooltip: # of discrim filters in first conv layer

name: which_model_netD
tooltip: selects model to use for netD

name: which_model_netG
tooltip: selects model to use for netG

name: n_layers_D
tooltip: only used if which_model_netD==n_layers

name: gpu_ids
tooltip: gpu ids: e.g. 0  0,1,2, 0,2. use -1 for CPU

name: dataset_mode
tooltip: chooses how datasets are loaded. [unaligned | aligned | single]

name: which_direction
tooltip: AtoB or BtoA

name: nThreads
tooltip: # threads for loading data

name: checkpoints_dir
tooltip: models are saved here

name: norm
tooltip: instance normalization or batch normalization

name: serial_batches
tooltip: if true, takes images in order to make batches, otherwise takes them randomly

name: display_winsize
tooltip: display window size

name: display_id
tooltip: window id of the web display

name: display_server
tooltip: visdom server of the web display

name: display_port
tooltip: visdom port of the web display

name: no_dropout
tooltip: no dropout for the generator

name: max_dataset_size
tooltip: Maximum number of samples allowed per dataset. If the dataset directory contains more than max_dataset_size, only a subset is loaded.

name: resize_or_crop
tooltip: scaling and cropping of images at load time [resize_and_crop|crop|scale_width|scale_width_and_crop]

name: no_flip
tooltip: if specified, do not flip the images for data augmentation

name: init_type
tooltip: network initialization [normal|xavier|kaiming|orthogonal]

name: verbose
tooltip: if specified, print more debugging information

name: suffix
tooltip: customized suffix: opt.name = opt.name + suffix

name: ab_norm
tooltip: colorization normalization factor

name: ab_max
tooltip: maximimum ab value

name: ab_quant
tooltip: quantization factor

name: l_norm
tooltip: colorization normalization factor

name: l_cent
tooltip: colorization centering factor

name: mask_cent
tooltip: mask centering factor

name: sample_p
tooltip: sampling geometric distribution, 1.0 means no hints

name: sample_Ps
tooltip: sampling geometric distribution, 1.0 means no hints

name: results_dir
tooltip: saves results here.

name: classification
tooltip: backprop trunk using classification, otherwise use regression

name: phase
tooltip: train_small, train, val, test, etc

name: which_epoch
tooltip: which epoch to load? set to latest to use latest cached model

name: how_many
tooltip: how many test images to run

name: aspect_ratio
tooltip: aspect ratio of result images

name: load_model
tooltip: load the latest model

name: half
tooltip: half precision model

name: test_img_dir
tooltip: testing images folder

name: results_img_dir
tooltip: save the results image folder

name: name
tooltip: name of the experiment. It decides where to store samples and models

name: model
tooltip: chooses which model to use. cycle_gan, pix2pix, test

name: display_freq
tooltip: frequency of showing training results on screen

name: display_ncols
tooltip: if positive, display all images in a single visdom web panel with certain number of images per row.

name: update_html_freq
tooltip: frequency of saving training results to html

name: print_freq
tooltip: frequency of showing training results on console

name: save_latest_freq
tooltip: frequency of saving the latest results

name: save_epoch_freq
tooltip: frequency of saving checkpoints at the end of epochs

name: epoch_count
tooltip: the starting epoch count, we save the model by <epoch_count>, <epoch_count>+<save_latest_freq>, ...

name: niter
tooltip: # of iter at starting learning rate

name: niter_decay
tooltip: # of iter to linearly decay learning rate to zero

name: beta1
tooltip: momentum term of adam

name: lr
tooltip: initial learning rate for adam

name: no_lsgan
tooltip: do *not* use least square GAN, if false, use vanilla GAN

name: lambda_GAN
tooltip: weight for GAN loss

name: lambda_A
tooltip: weight for cycle loss (A -> B -> A)

name: lambda_B
tooltip: weight for cycle loss (B -> A -> B)

name: lambda_identity
tooltip: use identity mapping. Setting lambda_identity other than 0 has an effect of scaling the weight of the identity mapping loss.

name: pool_size
tooltip: the size of image buffer that stores previously generated images

name: no_html
tooltip: do not save intermediate training results to [opt.checkpoints_dir]/[opt.name]/web/

name: lr_policy
tooltip: learning rate policy: lambda|step|plateau

name: lr_decay_iters
tooltip: multiply by a gamma every lr_decay_iters iterations

name: avg_loss_alpha
tooltip: exponential averaging weight for displaying loss

name: isTrain
tooltip: Always test
